thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Friday, 02 Mar 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-Pioneer Property Group Buys Nine Properties In Finland

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Pioneer Property Group Buys Nine Properties In Finland

organizations.name: brief-pioneer property group buys nine properties in finland

text:
March 2 (Reuters) - PIONEER PROPERTY GROUP ASA :
* ACQUISITION OF NINE PROPERTIES IN FINLAND * TOTAL PROPERTY VALUE OF MEUR 25.7 WITH ANNUAL RENTAL INCOME OF MEUR 1.6
* ‍PROPERTIES HAVE BEEN ACQUIRED FROM COR GROUP OY AND CORDIS OY​
* ‍LEASE CONTRACTS ARE TRIPLE-NET CONTRACTS WITH AVERAGE LENGTH OF THIRTEEN YEARS PLUS FIVE-YEAR OPTIONS​ Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage: (Gdynia Newsroom)
